gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 107, Magic 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Magic, 107-106, as they win their third straight to improve to 18-27. Jaren Jackson Jr. led five Grizzlies in double-figures with 30 points and eight rebounds as Luke Kennard added 15 points, five 3PT, five rebounds, and six assists. Paolo Banchero led Orlando with 27 points, five rebounds, and six assists as Wendell Carter Jr. totaled 20 points and nine rebounds. The Magic move to 23-22 with the loss.
